overview: ‘Egg’ is an absurd comedy about friendship and expecting the unexpected.  Ivy and Margaret meet for tea, same time, same place, everyday.  But today Ivy has some important news…  From first time director Alice Trueman and starring Sally Phillips (Bridget Jones's Diary, Miranda, Smack The Pony) and Kiki Kendrick (The Nine Lives of Thomas Katz).
tagline: 'Egg' is an absurd comedy about friendship and expecting the unexpected.
title: Egg
